name: exercise
description: Exercise logger and feedback based on NHS guidelines.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js -s && npm run lint:css -s
scripts.prebuild: npm run lint -s && npm run clean -s
scripts.build: npm run build:scripts -s && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:markup -s
scripts.build:scripts: browserify -d src/scripts/main.js -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map main.js.map --output dist/main.js.map] | hashmark -n dist/main.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:styles: stylus --include-css src/styles/main.styl -m -o dist/ && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main.css 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:markup: jade src/index.jade --obj assets.json -o dist && mv src/favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico
scripts.predev: npm run lint -s && npm run clean -s
scripts.dev: npm run dev:scripts -s && npm run dev:styles -s && npm run dev:markup -s
scripts.dev:styles: stylus --include-css src/styles/main.styl -o dist/ && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main.css 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}'

author: Richard Williams
